law.history: Repealed 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 301, subtit. 99, sec. 3, effective June 18, 1970. -- Created 1968 Ky. Acts ch. 113, secs. 4 to 7, effective June 13, 1968.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Substitute service of process in proceedings in court or before commissioner; requirements for defense of action; duties of insureds and adjustors to report to commissioner.
